  • Uses of SpotifyRequest in dev.gruncan.spotify.requests.albums

    Classes in dev.gruncan.spotify.requests.albums with annotations of type SpotifyRequest
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    AlbumGet
    Get Spotify catalog information for a single album.
    class 
    AlbumReleasesGet
    Get a list of new album releases featured in Spotify (shown, for example, on a Spotify player's "Browse" tab).
    class 
    AlbumSeveralGet
    Get Spotify catalog information for multiple albums identified by their Spotify IDs.
    class 
    AlbumTracksGet
    Get Spotify catalog information about an album's tracks.

  • Uses of SpotifyRequest in dev.gruncan.spotify.requests.artists

    Classes in dev.gruncan.spotify.requests.artists with annotations of type SpotifyRequest
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    ArtistGet
    Get Spotify catalog information for a single artist identified by their unique Spotify ID.
    class 
    ArtistsAlbumsGet
    Get Spotify catalog information about an artist's albums.
    class 
    ArtistSeveralGet
    Get Spotify catalog information for several artists based on their Spotify IDs.
    class 
    ArtistsRelatedArtistsGet
    Get Spotify catalog information about artists similar to a given artist.
    class 
    ArtistsTopTracksGet
    Get Spotify catalog information about an artist's top tracks by country.

  • Uses of SpotifyRequest in dev.gruncan.spotify.requests.audiobooks

    Classes in dev.gruncan.spotify.requests.audiobooks with annotations of type SpotifyRequest
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    AudiobookChaptersGet
    Get Spotify catalog information about an audiobook's chapters.
    Note: Audiobooks are only available for the US, UK, Ireland, New Zealand and Australia markets.
    Spotify Docs
    class 
    AudiobookGet
    Get Spotify catalog information for a single audiobook.
    Note: Audiobooks are only available for the US, UK, Ireland, New Zealand and Australia markets.
    Spotify Docs
    class 
    AudiobookSeveralGet
    Get Spotify catalog information for several audiobooks identified by their Spotify IDs.
    Note: Audiobooks are only available for the US, UK, Ireland, New Zealand and Australia markets.
    Spotify Docs

    Class
    Description

    CategoryGet

    class 
    CategorySeveralGet
    Get a list of categories used to tag items in Spotify (on, for example, the Spotify player's "Browse" tab).

  • Uses of SpotifyRequest in dev.gruncan.spotify.requests.me

    Classes in dev.gruncan.spotify.requests.me with annotations of type SpotifyRequest
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    MyFollowedArtistsGet
    Get the current user's followed artists.
    class 
    MyFollowingPersonGet
    Check to see if the current user is following one or more artists or other Spotify users.
    class 
    MyFollowPersonPut
    Get the current user's followed artists.
    class 
    MyProfileGet
    Get detailed profile information about the current user (including the current user's username).
    class 
    MyTopInfo
    Get the current user's top artists or tracks based on calculated affinity.
    class 
    MyUnfollowPersonDelete
    Remove the current user as a follower of one or more artists or other Spotify users.

    Class
    Description

    Remove one or more albums from the current user's 'Your Music' library.

    Remove one or more albums from the current user's 'Your Music' library.
    class 
    MyAlbumsSavedGet
    Check if one or more albums is already saved in the current Spotify user's 'Your Music' library.

  • Uses of SpotifyRequest in dev.gruncan.spotify.requests.me.player

    Classes in dev.gruncan.spotify.requests.me.player with annotations of type SpotifyRequest
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    MyPlayerCurrentlyPlayingGet
    Get the object currently being played on the user's Spotify account.
    class 
    MyPlayerDevicesGet
    Get information about a user's available devices.
    class 
    MyPlayerGet
    Get information about the user's current playback state, including track or episode, progress, and active device.
    class 
    MyPlayerNextPost
    Deprecated.
    class 
    MyPlayerPausePut
    Pause playback on the user's account.
    class 
    MyPlayerPreviousPost
    Deprecated.
    class 
    MyPlayerQueueGet
    Get the list of objects that make up the user's queue.
    class 
    MyPlayerRecentlyPlayedGet
    Get tracks from the current user's recently played tracks.
    class 
    MyPlayerRepeatPut
    Set the repeat mode for the user's playback.
    class 
    MyPlayerResumePut
    Start a new context or resume current playback on the user's active device.
    class 
    MyPlayerSeekPut
    Seeks to the given position in the user's currently playing track.
    class 
    MyPlayerSetVolumePut
    Set the volume for the user's current playback device.
    class 
    MyPlayerToggleShufflePut
    Toggle shuffle on or off for user's playback.
    class 
    MyPlayerTransferPut
    Transfer playback to a new device and determine if it should start playing.

  • Uses of SpotifyRequest in dev.gruncan.spotify.requests.playlists

    Classes in dev.gruncan.spotify.requests.playlists with annotations of type SpotifyRequest
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    PlaylistAddCoverImagePut
    Replace the image used to represent a specific playlist.
    class 
    PlaylistAddItemPost
    Add one or more items to a user's playlist.
    class 
    PlaylistCategoriesGet
    Get a list of Spotify playlists tagged with a particular category.
    class 
    PlaylistChangeDetailsPut
    Change a playlist's name and public/private state.
    class 
    PlaylistFeaturedGet
    Get a list of Spotify featured playlists (shown, for example, on a Spotify player's 'Browse' tab).
    class 
    PlaylistFollowingCheckGet
    Get Spotify catalog information for a single album.
    class 
    PlaylistFollowPut
    Add the current user as a follower of a playlist.
    class 
    PlaylistGet
    Get a playlist owned by a Spotify user.
    class 
    PlaylistImageGet
    Get the current image associated with a specific playlist.
    class 
    PlaylistRemoveItemDelete
    Remove one or more items from a user's playlist.
    class 
    PlaylistTracksGet
    Get full details of the items of a playlist owned by a Spotify user.
    class 
    PlaylistUnfollowDelete
    Remove the current user as a follower of a playlist.
    class 
    PlaylistUpdatePut
    Either reorder or replace items in a playlist depending on the request's parameters.
    To reorder items, set rangeStart, insertBefore, rangeLength and snapshotId.
    To replace items, set uris or bodyUris.
    Replacing items in a playlist will overwrite its existing items.

  • Uses of SpotifyRequest in dev.gruncan.spotify.requests.search

    Classes in dev.gruncan.spotify.requests.search with annotations of type SpotifyRequest
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    SearchGet
    Get Spotify catalog information about albums, artists, playlists, tracks, shows, episodes or audiobooks that match a keyword string.

    Classes in dev.gruncan.spotify.requests.tracks with annotations of type SpotifyRequest
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    TrackAudioAnalysisGet
    Get a low-level audio analysis for a track in the Spotify catalog.
    class 
    TrackAudioFeatureSeveralGet
    Get audio features for multiple tracks based on their Spotify IDs.
    class 
    TrackAudioFeaturesGet
    Get audio feature information for a single track identified by its unique Spotify ID.
    class 
    TrackGet
    Get Spotify catalog information for a single album.
    class 
    TrackRecommendationGet
    Recommendations are generated based on the available information for a given seed entity and matched against similar artists and tracks.
    class 
    TrackSeveralGet
    Get Spotify catalog information for multiple tracks based on their Spotify IDs.
